title: Woman property dealer shot dead in Rawalpindi - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
RAWALPINDI: A woman was shot dead by unidentified car occupants in Rawat area on Sunday, police said.

Musarat Bibi, 60, a property owner and real estate agent, was accompanied by three men and a woman whom she was supposed to show a piece of land near Budhal. According to the police, she was targeted on Chak Beli Road.

Later, the police shifted her body to a hospital for postmortem. A search has been launched to trace the culprits.

Shortly after the incident, senior police officers reached the crime scene and collected evidence. The city police officer has sought a report on the incident from SP Saddar division and directed the immediate arrest of the suspects. They added investigators were probing the case from various angles.

Published in Dawn, April 21st, 2025
